name: genesys-character-generator
description: Electron App for building Characters for the Genesys RPG System
author: BluSunrize

scripts.init: shx mkdir -p build && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.zip-win: cd build/genesys-character-generator-win32-ia32 && cross-var shx mkdir -p ../../dist/$npm_package_version && cross-var bestzip ../../dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version-win.zip * && cd ../..
scripts.zip-linux: cd build/genesys-character-generator-linux-x64 && cross-var shx mkdir -p ../../dist/$npm_package_version && cross-var bestzip ../../dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version-linux.zip * && cd ../..
scripts.build-win: npm run package-win && npm run zip-win
scripts.build-linux: npm run package-linux && npm run zip-linux
scripts.build-all: npm run build-win && npm run build-linux
scripts.copy-to-upload: shx rm -rf dist/upload && shx mkdir -p dist/upload && cross-var shx cp dist/$npm_package_version/*.zip dist/upload
scripts.build-release: npm run build-all && npm run copy-to-upload
